name: GUNS ON CARS - Free 3D Racing And Shooting Action Game
name_original: GUNS ON CARS - Free 3D Racing And Shooting Action Game
description:
GUNS ON CARS - Free 3D Racing And Shooting Action Game - The Ultimate Challenge is a free racing game with awesome Cars with Guns , with thrilling graphic designs, rocking musical score, and beautiful game scenes.

GUNS ON CARS - Free 3D Racing And Shooting Action Game has been designed for people of all ages and is especially optimized for iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus and iPhone 5S.

This game has beautiful locations and tracks that will test your driving skills of GUNS ON CARS - Free 3D Racing And Shooting Action Game .
